column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I made a list of all the things we needed to buy beforehand .
#id=2
#text=Next to the name of each object , I added the last price I remembered for it .
#id=3
#text=Then , I added up all the prices to get a general range for our budget .
#id=4
#text=I marked off what items I could leave behind if we were going to spend too much money .
#id=5
#text=I also added items we could add if we saved a lot of money .
#id=6
#text=Then , I made sure there was plenty of room in the car to hold the groceries and put my reusable grocery bags in the trunk .
#id=7
#text=The next day , I drove to the store and picked up what items were on my list and wrote down what prices I actually paid for them .
#id=8
#text=Since I had extra money , I also bought some ice cream .
#id=9
#text=I headed to the check-out and placed all my items gently on the conveyer belt .
#text=I said hi to the cashier , paid her what I owed , and took the groceries back to my car .
#text=I made sure to put the cart away , too .
#text=Then , I drove home and unloaded the groceries into their proper places .
